Great place for dinner. Great upscale decor, with both interesting and beautiful artwork on the walls along with nice music.  The staff is very attentive, friendly, helpful and funny.  I ordered the spinach salad which came with tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese (excellent!) The salmon with pesto came with pasta- excellent as well.  My husband ordered the cod with mashed potatoes and it was delightful as well.  He also ordered the "spicy" sangria which means it had vodka mixed in -a great "personality" drink to get your dinner started off right.  I highly recommend this place.
